member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN
member.summary: Specifies a value for the SVG stroke-linejoin property.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN.D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN_BEVEL
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'bevel' value.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN.D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN_MITER
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'miter' value. Note that this is equivalent to D2D1_LINE_JOIN_MITER_OR_BEVEL, not D2D1_LINE_JOIN_MITER.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN.D2D1_SVG_LINE_JOIN_ROUND
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'round' value.
